description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军上将，曾任中国人民解放军海军第九任政治委员、第十一届全国人民代表大会法律委员会副主任委员。他是一名非海军科班出身的海军上将。
description.en: A People's Liberation Army Navy (PLAN) admiral who served as the 9th Political Commissar of the PLAN and Vice Chairman of the Law Committee of the 11th National People's Congress. He is a navy admiral who did not start his career in the navy.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的武装力量。
description.en: The armed forces of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军空军第一航空预备学校

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军空军第一航空预备学校
空军第一航空预备学校

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军空军的一所飞行员预备学校。
description.en: A preparatory school for pilots of the People's Liberation Army Air Force.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军空军第七航空学校

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军空军第七航空学校

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军空军的一所飞行员航校。
description.en: An aviation school for pilots of the People's Liberation Army Air Force.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军国防大学

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军国防大学

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的最高军事学府。
description.en: The highest military academic institution of the People's Liberation Army.

en: Central Party School of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会轮训和培训中国共产党的高中级领导干部和马克思主义理论干部的学校。
description.en: The school where the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China trains senior and mid-level leading cadres and Marxist theoretical cadres.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的海上分支。
description.en: The naval branch of the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军上将，胡彦林的前任海军政治委员。
description.en: A People's Liberation Army Navy admiral and Hu Yanlin's predecessor as Political Commissar of the Navy.

description.zh-cn: 2003年发生的一起中国人民解放军海军潜艇事故，导致原海军政委杨怀庆被免职。
description.en: A PLAN submarine accident in 2003 that led to the dismissal of the then-Political Commissar of the Navy, Yang Huaiqing.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军上将，胡彦林的继任海军政治委员。
description.en: A People's Liberation Army Navy admiral and Hu Yanlin's successor as Political Commissar of the Navy.

nodes.id: 全国人民代表大会法律委员会

zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会法律委员会
en: Law Committee of the National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会的专门委员会之一。
description.en: One of the specialized committees of the National People's Congress.

nodes.id: 第十一届全国人民代表大会

zh-cn: 第十一届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中国黑龙江省的省会，胡彦林的出生地。
description.en: The capital of Heilongjiang Province, China, and the birthplace of Hu Yanlin.

description.zh-cn: 满洲国及中华民国大陆时期的一个省份。
description.en: A province during the Manchukuo and Republic of China mainland periods.

description.zh-cn: 胡彦林出生于滨江省哈尔滨市。
description.en: Hu Yanlin was born in Harbin, Binjiang Province.

description.zh-cn: 胡彦林于1959年7月入伍参加中国人民解放军，2008年12月退役。
description.en: Hu Yanlin joined the People's Liberation Army in July 1959 and retired in December 2008.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军空军第一航空预备学校

description.zh-cn: 胡彦林于1959年7月入伍后，在空军第一航空预备学校学习一年。
description.en: After enlisting in July 1959, Hu Yanlin studied at the PLAAF No. 1 Preparatory Aviation School for one year.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军空军第七航空学校

description.zh-cn: 胡彦林于1960年进入空军第七航空学校学习飞行。
description.en: In 1960, Hu Yanlin entered the PLAAF No. 7 Aviation School to learn to fly.

description.zh-cn: 胡彦林于1960年10月加入中国共产党。
description.en: Hu Yanlin joined the Communist Party of China in October 1960.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军国防大学

description.zh-cn: 胡彦林于1986年9月至1988年7月在国防大学基本系学习。
description.en: From September 1986 to July 1988, Hu Yanlin studied at the Basic Department of the PLA National Defence University.

description.zh-cn: 胡彦林于1991年9月进入中共中央党校干部进修班学习。
description.en: In September 1991, Hu Yanlin entered the cadre training class at the Central Party School of the CPC.

description.zh-cn: 胡彦林于2003年6月至2008年12月担任中国人民解放军海军政治委员。
description.en: Hu Yanlin served as the Political Commissar of the People's Liberation Army Navy from June 2003 to December 2008.

description.zh-cn: 海军361潜艇失事后，时任海军政委杨怀庆被就地免职。
description.en: Following the PLAN Submarine 361 accident, the then-Political Commissar of the Navy, Yang Huaiqing, was dismissed from his post.

description.zh-cn: 海军361潜艇失事导致原海军政委杨怀庆被免职，胡彦林随后接任该职务。
description.en: The PLAN Submarine 361 accident led to the dismissal of the original Political Commissar of the Navy, Yang Huaiqing, and Hu Yanlin subsequently took over the position.

description.zh-cn: 胡彦林接替因海军361潜艇失事而被免职的杨怀庆，担任海军政治委员。
description.en: Hu Yanlin succeeded Yang Huaiqing, who was dismissed due to the PLAN Submarine 361 accident, as the Political Commissar of the Navy.

description.zh-cn: 刘晓江在胡彦林退役后，接替其担任海军政治委员。
description.en: After Hu Yanlin's retirement, Liu Xiaojiang succeeded him as the Political Commissar of the Navy.

relationships.target: 全国人民代表大会法律委员会

description.zh-cn: 2010年4月29日，胡彦林被任命为第十一届全国人民代表大会法律委员会副主任委员。
description.en: On April 29, 2010, Hu Yanlin was appointed as the Vice Chairman of the Law Committee of the 11th National People's Congress.

relationships.source: 全国人民代表大会法律委员会
relationships.target: 第十一届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会法律委员会是第十一届全国人民代表大会的专门委员会之一。
description.en: The Law Committee is one of the specialized committees of the 11th National People's Congress.
